WhyLoginMsg:
**Why Should I Log In To Use The Bot ??** 

‚Ä¢ The bot is using instagram api to react with instagram like a real person ( a real account ), so with too many requests; instagram thinks I am bot so it blocks the account.

‚Ä¢ Now, when the user log in with his own account, the  bot will use the account to react with instagram, like any other user uses instagram.

‚Ä¢ So, for each account ( user logged in ), the requests will be less than 200 in 1 hour ( instagram requests limit ), but for one account for all users , there will be more than 5000 requests per 1 hour üòÅ.
HowToDownloadMsg:
üàπ **To Download Posts, Reels or IGTV, Just Send The Link, Example:**
¬ª [Post] https://www.instagram.com/p/CVBAoKBp3Za/
¬ª [Reel] https://www.instagram.com/reel/CUN_12JBmn1/
¬ª [IGTV] https://www.instagram.com/tv/CT1IRyZhUzO/


‚ò∏ **To Download Stories or Highlights:** 
- Send The Username or Profile then Click [Download Stories] Button, Example:
¬ª [Profile Link] https://www.instagram.com/jasonstatham/
¬ª [Profile Username] @jasonstatham

- Send The Story or Highlight Link ( The Story Must Be Active ). 
¬ª [Highlight Link] https://www.instagram.com/s/aGlnaGxpZ2h0OjE3OTY4MTU0ODk5MTk4MDYz?story_media_id=1926472402969532221_427553890

üîç **To Search for Instagram Users:** 
- Type `@IGLoaderRoBot @username` But Don't Send it & Wait
